data.title: Oberlin College and Conservatory
data.meta_description: Biography and contact information for Robert Shannon, Professor of Piano, Director, Cooper International Competition for piano. As a performer, educator, and recording artist, pianist Robert Shannon has traveled across the world performing and teaching a diverse repertoire ranging from Bach to John Adams. A double-degree alumnus of Oberlin, Shannon earned a Master of Music at
data.text:
Oberlin's Cooper International Competition for Piano Returns in 2023

“We are thrilled to bring back the Cooper piano competition and to collaborate with the Cleveland Orchestra once again as we celebrate the best young piano talent in the world,” says Oberlin Professor of Piano Robert Shannon, Cooper piano competition director and jury chair. Applications are due on April 25.

This Week in Photos: Birds of a Feather

A whimsical flock of socially distanced ducks on the Woodland Street pylons serves as inspiration for this week’s photo series.
